## Tailored to meet the unique needs of every multifamily market segment
From Class A to affordable housing communities, find out how Kelsey can work for you.
[Class A](https://www.getzuma.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Class B](https://www.getzuma.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Class C](https://www.getzuma.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Affordable](https://www.getzuma.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
Class A
Kelsey provides personalized service, handles requests, and promotes luxury amenities to meet high-end renters' needs, while expertly matching them with ideal apartments.
üó£Ô∏è Responds to ILS notes addressing questions and concerns
üß† Knowledgeable of community, floorplan, and unit amenities 
üñºÔ∏è Share media assets like floorplan images etc.
Class B
Kelsey effortlessly handles leads across all marketing channels, offers specials, and increases foot traffic
üìû Responds to prospect phone calls to engage and qualify
üß† Adept at providing the most up to date move-in specials
üìÖ Easily coordinates in-person, virtual, and self-guided tours
Class C
Kelsey highlights cost-effective options that fit within tight budgets and describes nuanced rental applicant requirements. 
üó£Ô∏è Fluent in conversing in over 200+ languages
üìë Abides by Fair Housing Laws while navigating applicant policy questions
üö´ Doesn‚Äôt get tripped up by spelling mistakes or slang
Affordable 
Kelsey evaluates applicant eligibility and communicates in 200+ languages for accessibility.
‚úÖ Ensures quality traffic as prospects are qualified based on occupancy & income
üß† Adept at navigating Fair Housing Laws and discussing various voucher programs.
# Why Property Management Companies Love Zuma
By combining cutting-edge AI with human expertise, customizable workflows, and exceptional support, Zuma addresses the unique challenges faced by multifamily leasing professionals.
Human + AI Hybrid Approach
Zuma is the ONLY platform that combines AI with human oversight, ensuring high-quality responses without handoffs to your onsite team. We are on the clock 24x7x365 ensuring your leads always get the white-glove treatment to convert them to tours!
Five-Star Customer Support & Onboarding
Zuma sets the industry standard with lightning-fast onboarding process and unparalleled customer support, ensuring clients get the most value out of our technology from day one.
Customizable Workflows and Brand Voice
We offer highly customizable workflows that adapt to each property's specific needs and processes. This flexibility, coupled with the ability to maintain a consistent brand voice, empowers leasing teams to convert more leads and close deals faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66bae8a7504d59e3f6a284ce/66c0aa0f4a094cea4bfea3fc_w1.png)

### Company Overview: Zuma

**Website:** [getzuma.com](https://www.getzuma.com/)  
**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S21  
**Team Size:** 30 employees  
**Group Partner:** Brad Flora  
**Company Mission:** "We help businesses convert leads into sales in minutes using text."  

**Industry Tags:** 
- Artificial Intelligence 
- B2B 
- PropTech 
- San Francisco Bay Area

---

#### What Zuma Does

Zuma operates at the intersection of AI and real estate marketing. It empowers multifamily property management companies to enhance their lead-to-lease conversion rates. Essentially, it‚Äôs a tool that transforms how these businesses engage with potential renters through smart, text-based interactions. Users can manage leads, qualify them automatically, and handle inquiries at lightning speed thanks to their AI assistant named Kelsey.

#### Key Features:
- **24/7 Response**: Kelsey interacts with leads around the clock, ensuring no potential tenant feels ignored.
- **Seamless Integrations**: Works with existing platforms like Yardi, Realpage, and Entrata.
- **Customization**: Offers tailored workflows that fit different property needs‚Äîfrom luxury to budget-friendly options.
- **Performance Metrics**: Users report a 53% faster response rate and a 2.4x increase in lead-to-visit conversions. Plus, 44.8% improved overall conversion rates.

---

#### Solutions Provided
1. **AI Leasing**: Engage prospects effectively to maximize property occupancy.
2. **Lead Qualification**: Automate this process, allowing teams to focus on closing deals.
3. **Custom Workflows**: Adapt to unique property management styles and requirements.
4. **Insights and Reporting**: Provides actionable data from lead interactions to refine strategies.

---

#### Why Property Managers Love Zuma:

- **Human + AI Hybrid Approach**: By combining AI with human oversight, clients benefit from high-quality responses tailored to their specific needs without overwhelming their on-site teams.
  
- **Exceptional Support and Onboarding**: Clients experience fast implementation and ongoing support that help them integrate Zuma's technology more efficiently.

- **Versatile Applications Across Market Segments**: From Class A luxury communities to affordable housing, Zuma's Kelsey is equipped to meet diverse rental demands.

---

#### Takeaways

In a world where speed and efficiency define success, Zuma stands out. It provides not just a tool but a partnership that empowers property managers to elevate their marketing game. By focusing on AI-enhanced communication, they enable leasing teams to close deals faster and smarter. If you're in the multifamily management space, Zuma seems like a no-brainer for boosting your lead conversion rates. Looking to see what it‚Äôs all about? You can [book a demo](https://www.getzuma.com/<https:/www.getzuma.com/request-demo>).

--- 

In summary, Zuma isn't just about technology; it‚Äôs about transforming an entire approach to property management. The combination of AI and exceptional human service is a potent blend that helps businesses thrive. So, if converting leads into leases in mere minutes sounds appealing, you might want to check them out.
